**Example 1: 添加组织成员邮箱**



Input: 

```
tccli organization AddOrganizationMemberEmail --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --MemberUin 111111111111 \
    --Email 12***@qq.com \
    --CountryCode 86 \
    --Phone 18***11
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "BindId": 1,
        "RequestId": "b46d2afe-6893-4529-bc96-2c82d9214957"
    }
}
```
